title: Excellent implementation
comment: Very light, fast and fun!
The scoring does not work with this card.  If you have this card at the end,  your hand total is supposed to be 69, regardless of the other cards in your hand.

title: Fun game
comment: Great way to pass time and takes up very little space in your phone.

title: Classic
comment: I remember playing this on big bro's pc years ago. These cards...lol.

title: Draw 69 and Quitter
comment: I was able to crash the game by trying to draw with no cards left in the discard pile. That was awesome!

title: Yep
comment: Really good game
Lightweight and fun

title: fun UNO type game
comment: I played this long ago on the PC, it was the "adult" version.  This is in the same spirit and a "clean" version.

title: AWESOME
comment: I've wanted to find a copy of this game for over a decade. Thank you so much for putting it on a portable platform! Perfect!

title: Very addicted game

title: Fun
comment: 2 things. Faster, a really fast speed. Get rid of the double tab required if you hit the wrong card.
Luv this game

title: Loved this on PPC a while back, love it here!
comment: Would it be possible to get a background color change option? Maybe Google achievements?

title: Pretty darn good...  but,
comment: Me thinks your game used a loaded deck, even in 'honest' mode.  Amendment, the game straight up cheats.

title: Cheat Code
comment: Enter "originalhotdeath" in the cheat code under settings and you get the less family friendly version.
Fun variation Loved the Win3.1 version. Glad to have it on android.

title: Epic
comment: Love this game reminds me of uno

title: Love
comment: Simple and addicting.

title: Good game
comment: It  is a vary good I like it I can't stop playing it

title: Nostalgic!
comment: Reminds me of the good old days playing on Windows 3.1, and hoping that you didn't wind up with M.A.D. since playing that card crashed the game (which WAS deliciously ironic, one must admit).  This is nice looking, fun, and joyfully playable.  Thanks for resurrecting this classic!  I'd like to add my voice to the people asking for the option to use the original naughty card names.  Also, anyone know anything about cheat codes?  What are they?  What do they do?

title: Impressive
comment: Amazing, and very Fun I have some suggestions... -add local AND online multiplayer -allow a back option like if you accidentally use the Wild you press back to put a different card - add a number stack option, were if you have more of the same card or number, you can place them ALL
Hilarious

title: Only missing one thing
comment: Multiplayer. Please make this possible. This game is awesome!

title: Excellent
comment: Game is very addicting.

title: Sucks
comment: Thus game is horrible

title: Love this game...
comment: Much better than normal uno...

title: Awesome!
comment: Love this game.  I kept an old PocketPC around just to play this game, but now that I can play it on my phone, I can retire that 10 year old handheld.   Great game, and it's free.  Can't beat it.  Thank you!

title: Eh
comment: Tried the game over and over again and just can't win. Lost interest. Computer players seem to be ganging up.

title: GreatGame
comment: Would love to see multiplayer.

title: Great game
comment: Good time killer and it doesn't eat up memory. Small glitch force closes when switching portrait to landscape. But it reopens where left off.

title: Better than...
comment: Uno.

title: Needs an "Oops" button.
comment: A way to undo a misclick would be awesome. For instance, I accidentally played the MAD card when i didn't want to and got 1240 points for the trouble. Also, why so politically correct? An option to have the original name for at least one card (you know the one I mean, you say it when you play it) would be nice.

title: Best free app!!
comment: Smooth gameplay and addictingly fun. I love it!

title: Amazing
comment: Thanks guy, amazing job

title: Round scores get doubled?
comment: Randomly at the end of a round, all scores get doubled...usually when 1 player besides me had 0...

title: Excellent
comment: Very impressive & open source

comment: My favourite......

comment: Absolutely love this GAME.. I've been playing it for hours

title: Found a bug
comment: When I want to keep my cards & draw rather than retaliate I shouldn't be able to tap deck & draw extra - should just allow pass to take penalty. Excellent game since pocketpc - thanks for developing!

title: Kate.
comment: This game is very fun. Great job.  Y

title: Fantastic
comment: The variation of rules allows for strategy rather than simple luck. Glad to see this on Android, this is the app I missed the most when my PPC died.
It is rubbish because when 1st played it, its completely different to the simple, basic and they've added just too much rules. Plz don't get this ever

comment: its.............. bad. if i dont have the or the number it gets stuck
Great game! 5th * when FF is put in. Everyone complaining about it being hard or problems with cards needs to read the instructions carefully!
Stupid
Great game but has 2 bugs still.Draw 4 Wilds can be used even if you have playable same-color cards and Luck of Irish won't reduce any Draw 2 cards
Excellent game, very addicting! I would have given it a 5 if the there was an option to fast forward once the human player is ejected.
Fun game. Needs the ability to complete the round when human player gets ejected.
I have played HD for almost 20 years now and I was thrilled to find the Android version! I'd like to be able to choose the number of opponents and nam
Great game, have been waiting for this since moving from WM. Need way to speed play after getting ejected. Pretty boring to watch the cpu players
I'm a big uno fan and Hot Death is similar but way more fun.
Fantastic game! Any chance of a 'fast-forward' option, for skipping to the end of a hand from which you are ejected? Otherwise.. GREAT! :)
Great!! You must try,bro!
Great I love it, even when I'm bored
Great game. Love it! EVO.
Retta Decent lil gane! *ANDROID*
Fun, but I don't have the time for it.

title: Awesome game
comment: Awesome game. I wish the game would speed up when you get ejected.

title: Cool game, but locks constantly
comment: Love playing Hot Death Uno (also had it on my old Windows Mobile), and the game plays good. Unfortunately, it constantly locks up my Incredible requiring me to pull the battery to reboot. Because of this I can only rate it three stars. Hopefully a fix will be coming for this issue.
Love it! I used to play this on my windows mobile phone, so glad it's on android and much improved. Highly recommend

title: Excellent Card Game!
comment: A fun tweaking of Uno's ruleset. The original version of the game for the PC had less family-friendly names for certain cards, and I have yet to see if there's a way to enable those in this app. Otherwise, a pitch-perfect port of the PC version.
Love this game!! No idea why anyone would give this a bad review (yeah...that's at you Traci and Teresa). Keep up the great work smorgasbork.
Awesome game! One of my favs so far!

title: Hillarious addictive fun!
comment: This game takes UNO to the next level. I imagine this game was invented by some college kids that were baked out of their mind. "Like, what if there was a card that did ...?" "Oh no, wait! What if there was ANOTHER card that countered that card, and also did ...?" "Dude, let's go to TacoBell!" I hold back a star because there is a bug that when you are in between hands and you rotate phone, game is lost and it resets, starting everyone at zero. Otherwise, great app. I look forward to playing it right now!
Used to play on my ipaq back in the day! Very fun.
Awesome fun! Love it :-)
Just like the old UNO game. Love the hilarious additional cards. Great game to pass some time.
Man, so much harshness for this game. It's not perfect, but it has great potential. Being GPL bumps it up a star. Hope it continues being developed!
Not fun at all
sucks
